title: Chiropractor Services - Lutz, FL - Brightstar Chiropractic
description: Brightstar Chiropractic provides comprehensive chiropractor services for the local Lutz, FL community. Call now to schedule your adjustment.
cleaned_text: Located near Tampa Bay, in the heart of Lutz, Florida, Brightstar Chiropractic and Progressive Rehab is dedicated to helping you achieve your health objectives. Dr. Sev Kessler and the entire staff are committed to bringing you improved health and a better quality of life by teaching and practicing the true principles of chiropractic and natural health. We understand how pain can deter your daily activities and make life more difficult and less enjoyable. Combining skill and expertise that spans the entire Chiropractic & natural health spectrum, our goal is to help you reach yours! Allow the Brightstar Chiropractic Team to apply our effective solutions to help you achieve a happier, healthier self. From chronic pain to injury evaluations and solutions, our doctor has helped people of all ages and circumstances, achieve a pain relieving results. Give our local Lutz, FL office a call today to book your next visit with chiropractor [Dr. Kessler](/meet-our-chiropractor). "I'm a newer patient of Dr. Kessler, however he has already restored my faith in chiropractic care. He's friendly, gentle, explains what he's doing, and takes the time to answer my questions. Not to mention, I've already seen improvement. If you're looking for a chiropractor, I do recommend BrightStar." - Elaine E.
